@graph.name: Instant Pot Indian Cabbage and Peas (Patta Gobi Subzi) - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Instant Pot Indian Cabbage and Peas! Pataa Gobi Ki subzi. This Cabbage Curry is made in a pressure cooker. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Nut-free Braised Cabbage Recipe

itemListElement.name: Instant Pot Indian Cabbage and Peas (Patta Gobi Subzi)

@graph.name: Instant Pot Indian Cabbage and Peas (Patta Gobi Subzi)
@graph.description: Instant Pot Indian Cabbage and Peas! Patta Gobi Ki Subzi This Cabbage Curry is made in a pressure cooker. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Nut-free Braised Cabbage Recipe. Stove top option in notes
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon organic safflower oil or mustard or peanut oil
8  curry leaves (, fresh, frozen or dried)
1 teaspoon chopped green chili or to taste
1/2 cup peas (, let the frozen peas sit outside to thaw while the cabbage cooks)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat instant pot on saute, and select "more". Add oil and let it get hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat instant pot on saute, and select "more". Add oil and let it get hot.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mustard seeds and let them start to change color and pop. Add in the curry leaves, garlic, green chile and asafetida if using. Mix well and cook for half  to 1 minute, stirring frequently.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the mustard seeds and let them start to change color and pop. Add in the curry leaves, garlic, green chile and asafetida if using. Mix well and cook for half  to 1 minute, stirring frequently.

recipeInstructions.text: Add turmeric and mix in. Switch off saute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add turmeric and mix in. Switch off saute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add cabbage and salt and mix well. Add water and mix well. (you can add in 2 tbsp fresh or shredded coconut, cayenne for extra heat )
recipeInstructions.name: Add cabbage and salt and mix well. Add water and mix well. (you can add in 2 tbsp fresh or shredded coconut, cayenne for extra heat )

recipeInstructions.text: Close lid and pressure cook on low pressure or 3 mins (4 mins if the cabbage wasnt finely chopped or has hardy leaves). Let the pot sit for 5 mins then quick release.
recipeInstructions.name: Close lid and pressure cook on low pressure or 3 mins (4 mins if the cabbage wasnt finely chopped or has hardy leaves). Let the pot sit for 5 mins then quick release.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in the peas and let sit for a minute. Garnish with cilantro and pepper flakes and some lemon juice if you like and serve with dals and flatbread or rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix in the peas and let sit for a minute. Garnish with cilantro and pepper flakes and some lemon juice if you like and serve with dals and flatbread or rice.

@graph.keywords: cabbage curry, cabbage curry in pressure cooker, indian cabbage stir fry, instant pot cabbage and peas
